faq.question: What is Remote Pilot License?
faq.answer: A remote pilot license is equivalent to a driver's license but is used for drones. This license grants you permission to fly a drone for commercial purposes in India.

faq.question: Why do I need Drone Flying Training?
faq.answer: Drone pilot training helps you acquire the necessary drone flying skills and it is also a mandatory requirement to get a remote pilot license.

faq.question: What type of Drone Remote Pilot License do we use?
faq.answer: CAT1 (VLOS). Which enables you to fly any DGCA-approved drone.

faq.question: How long will my drone license be valid?
faq.answer: 10 years from the day of receiving your certificate. After that, you can reapply again for a new certificate.

faq.question: What are the eligibility criteria to apply for a remote pilot license?
faq.answer: You should be 18+ in age, completed your 10th-grade education, and own a valid passport.

faq.question: Are we DGCA Certified?
faq.answer: Yes. We are India's first dual DGCA Certified company for both Pilot training and drone manufacturing.

faq.question: How many days is the training program?
faq.answer: The program is for 9 full days and will take place in our Headquarters, Agni College, Chennai.

faq.question: How do I apply?
faq.answer: Here's the application form for you to apply: Application Form. We will reach out to you once you have filled this out and addressed any queries before you go ahead with your payment.

faq.question: What is the cost of the program?
faq.answer: The current cost of the program is 24,999/-. This only includes training & certification costs. This does not cover any stay, food, and transport costs.

faq.question: Where does the training take place?
faq.answer: Agni College of Technology, Old Mahabalipuram Road, Thalambur Rd, Chennai, Tamil Nadu - 600130.

faq.question: Is there an online version of the program?
faq.answer: No. Due to the nature of the training, the courses need to be conducted at a verified physical location only.

faq.question: Criteria for receiving my certificate?
faq.answer: Finish the 9 Days drone training course & pass the physical/theory exam.
